projects.name: PeepoSuite
projects.desc: My very first portfolio site, showcasing my apps from 2020 to 2022! This was created using Framer Motion, Styled Components, and React Responsive.

projects.name: Ignite
projects.desc: My first try into React, done with RAWG video games API. Framer Motion, Styled Components and Intersection Observer are included.

projects.name: PeepoEats
projects.desc: Food rating website using Angular and Firebase, based on chess Elo system and inspired by FaceMash.

projects.name: PeepoEats Reset
projects.desc: Same food rating website without backend, where ratings reset on page refresh.

projects.name: Merry Christmas Corgi
projects.desc: Website that fetches random Corgi images from Unsplash API. Image toggles between Christmas tree and random Corgi on request.

projects.name: Photo Toto
projects.desc: A memory flashcard game with Wordle-like guess distribution, using Charts.css for charting.

projects.name: BaiToto
projects.desc: A website for my cousin's YouTube channel, BaiToto, with a game to find her puppy Toto among cards using some CSS Card Tricks. Vue Router is included.

projects.name: PeepoBitcoin
projects.desc: Imagine tracking Bitcoin returns locally without logging into your account. All you need is your purchase price and amount.

projects.name: PeepoCountdown
projects.desc: Simple countdown app originally made for a friend, inspired by the anticipation to his quitting date.

projects.name: PeepoMoney
projects.desc: A money growth app relative to monthly savings, just to show how much is saved every second.

projects.name: PeepoCharts
projects.desc: A fake stock chart generator using Vue and Google Charts, with adjustable price and volatility. My very first Vue app!
